segments.text: Have you heard about the new iPhone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I heard it's supposed to come out in June . Are you thinking about getting one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to . It's a cell phone , camera , PAD and mp3 player all in one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if I had enough money , I'd buy one , but I don't even have enough to buy one of their shuffle spods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how big is a shuffle iPod ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the first generation iPod shuffle is about the size of a park of gum and the second generation iPod shuffle is about half the size of the first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how many gigs of music can it hold ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's either one or two gigs . I can't remember .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not much at all . I think it's about 100 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you're right , that's not bad at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got one for my birthday when they first came out , but after the battery died out , I never brought another one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why didn't you just buy another battery for it so you could use it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's one of the problems with having an iPod . Though an iPod might have an above average battery life , once the battery is dead , so is your iPod .
segments.speaker: S1
